Content.Option: Network level firewalls can safely replace device level firewalls
Network level firewalls can be used to block websites on a network
VPNs can be used to bypass network level firewalls
Network level firewalls have no effect on network performance

Slide.Name: Select all applications of network based firewalls

Content.Option: Impersonation of other networks and devices

Slide.Name: Which of the following is the least secure?

Content.Option: Having firewalls on the network and on each device
Only having firewalls on the network
Only having firewalls on each device
